app.name: Focus Flow
app.tagline: Smart Learning Timer Based on Neuroscience

settings.title: Timer Settings
settings.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset to default?
settings.confirmDeletePreset: Are you sure you want to delete this preset?
settings.confirmResetBuiltinPreset: Are you sure you want to reset this built-in preset? This will remove all custom modifications.

audio.piano_desc: Soft piano chords and arpeggios, creating a calm learning atmosphere

donate.title: Thank You for Your Support!
donate.message: Your donation will help me continue to improve Focus Flow and develop more useful tools.

guide.title: Install to Home Screen
guide.message: In Safari, tap the share button and then select "Add to Home Screen" to install the app on your device.
guide.step2: Scroll and select "Add to Home Screen"

about.title: About Focus Flow
about.description: Focus Flow is a smart learning timer based on neuroscience principles, promoting brain recall and memory consolidation through random reminders.
about.author: Developer

notifications.shortBreakStarted: Time's up! Close your eyes and review what you just learned
